info.title: Azure Communication Service Call Automation APIs
info.description: Azure Communication Service Call Automation APIs

get.summary: Get audio routing groups from a call.

200.description: Returns the get audio routing group response.

delete.summary: Delete audio routing group from a call.

202.description: Returns the delete audio routing group response.

parameters.name: updateAudioRoutingGroupRequest
parameters.description: The update audio routing group request.

200.description: Returns the update audio routing group response.
Returns the get call response.
Returns the cancel all media operations response.
Returns the keep alive response.

post.summary: Transfer the call to a participant or to another call.
post.description: Transfer the call to a participant or to another call.

post.summary: Create audio routing group in a call.

201.description: Returns the create audio routing group response.

post.summary: Get participants from a server call.

parameters.name: getAllParticipantsWithCallLocatorRequest
parameters.description: The request payload for getting all the participants.

200.description: Returns the get participants response.

post.summary: Add a participant to the call.
post.description: Add a participant to the call.

parameters.name: addParticipantWithCallLocatorRequest
parameters.description: The add participant request using call locator.

post.summary: Remove participant from the call using identifier.
post.description: Remove participant from the call using identifier.

parameters.name: removeParticipantWithCallLocatorRequest
parameters.description: The identifier of the participant to be removed from the call.

post.summary: Get participant from the call using identifier.
post.description: Get participant from the call using identifier.

200.description: Returns the get participant response.

parameters.name: playAudioToParticipantRequest
parameters.description: The play audio to participant request.

post.summary: cancel media operation for a participant.
post.description: cancel media operation for a participant.

parameters.name: cancelParticipantMediaOperationRequest
parameters.description: The cancel participant media operation request

200.description: Returns the cancel media operation response.
Returns the get participants response.

post.summary: Add a participant to the call.
post.description: Add a participant to the call.

post.summary: Remove participant from the call using identifier.
post.description: Remove participant from the call using identifier.

parameters.name: removeParticipantRequest
parameters.description: The identifier of the participant to be removed from the call.

post.summary: Get participant from the call using identifier.
post.description: Get participant from the call using identifier.

parameters.name: getParticipantRequest
parameters.description: The identifier of the participant to get from the call.

200.description: Returns the get participant response.

parameters.name: playAudioToParticipantRequest
parameters.description: The play audio to participant request.

post.summary: Cancel media operation for a participant.
post.description: Cancel media operation for a participant.

parameters.name: cancelMediaOperationRequest
parameters.description: The cancel media operation for participant request.

200.description: Returns the cancel media operation response.

parameters.name: muteParticipantRequest
parameters.description: The identifier of the participant to mute in the call.

200.description: Returns the mute participant response.

parameters.name: unmuteParticipantRequest
parameters.description: The identifier of the participant to unmute in the call.

200.description: Returns the unmute participant response.

post.summary: Hold meeting audio of a participant in the call.
post.description: Hold meeting audio of a participant in the call.

parameters.name: holdMeetingAudioRequest
parameters.description: The request payload for holding meeting audio for a participant.

200.description: Returns the hold meeting audio of participant response.

post.summary: Resume meeting audio of a participant in the call.
post.description: Resume meeting audio of a participant in the call.

parameters.name: resumeMeetingAudioRequest
parameters.description: The request payload for resuming meeting audio for a participant.

200.description: Returns the resume meeting audio of participant response.

parameters.name: startCallRecordingWithCallLocatorRequest
parameters.description: The request body of start call recording request.

200.description: Returns the start call recording response.
Returns the recording properties.
Returns the stop call recording response.
Returns the pause call recording response.
Returns the resume call recording response.
Returns the cancel media operation response.

targets.description: The target identities that would be receivers in the audio routing group.

UpdateAudioRoutingGroupRequest.description: The update audio routing group request.

targets.description: The target identities that would be receivers in the audio routing group.

CreateCallRequest.description: The request payload for create call.

alternateCallerId.description: The alternate identity of the source of the call if dialing out to a pstn number

requestedCallEvents.description: The requested call events to subscribe to.

CreateCallResult.description: The response payload of the create call operation.

CallConnectionState.description: The state of the call connection.

alternateCallerId.description: The alternate identity of the source of the call if dialing out to a pstn number

requestedCallEvents.description: The requested call events to subscribe to.

CallLocatorModel.description: The locator used for joining or taking action on a call.

PlayAudioRequest.description: The request payload for playing audio.

audioFileUri.description:
The media resource uri of the play audio request. 
Currently only Wave file (.wav) format audio prompts are supported.
More specifically, the audio content in the wave file must be mono (single-channel),
16-bit samples with a 16,000 (16KHz) sampling rate.

loop.description: The flag indicating whether audio file needs to be played in loop or not.

operationContext.description: The value to identify context of the operation.

audioFileId.description: An id for the media in the AudioFileUri, using which we cache the media resource.

PlayAudioResult.description: The response payload for play audio operation.

operationContext.description: The operation context provided by client.

resultDetails.description: The result info for the operation.

CallingOperationResultDetails.description: The result details of calling operation.

code.description: The result code associated with the operation.

subcode.description: The subcode that further classifies the result.

message.description: The message is a detail explanation of subcode.

targetParticipant.description: The identity of the target where call should be transfer to.

targetCallConnectionId.description: The call connection id to replace the current call with. This parameter should be used for consultative transfer.

alternateCallerId.description: The alternate identity of the transferor if transferring to a pstn number.

TransferCallResult.description: The response payload for transfer call operation.

operationContext.description: The operation context provided by client.

resultDetails.description: The result info for the operation.

targets.description: The target identities that would be receivers in the audio routing group.

CreateAudioRoutingGroupResult.description: The response payload of the create audio routing group operation.

alternateCallerId.description: The alternate identity of source participant.

participant.description: The participant to be added to the call.

participantId.description: The id of the added participant.

RemoveParticipantWithCallLocatorRequest.description: The remove participant by identifier request.

identifier.description: The identifier of the participant to be removed from the call.

GetParticipantWithCallLocatorRequest.description: The get participant by identifier request using call locator.

PlayAudioToParticipantWithCallLocatorReq.description: The request payload for playing audio with call locator to participant.

identifier.description: The identifier of the participant to play audio to.

callbackUri.description: The callback Uri to receive PlayAudio status notifications.

audioFileUri.description:
The media resource uri of the play audio request. 
Currently only Wave file (.wav) format audio prompts are supported.
More specifically, the audio content in the wave file must be mono (single-channel),
16-bit samples with a 16,000 (16KHz) sampling rate.

loop.description: The flag indicating whether audio file needs to be played in loop or not.

operationContext.description: The value to identify context of the operation.

audioFileId.description: An id for the media in the AudioFileUri, using which we cache the media resource.

CancelParticipantMediaOperationWithCallL.description: The request payload for stopping a media operation for a participant with call locator.

mediaOperationId.description: The operationId of the media operation to cancel.

alternateCallerId.description: The alternate identity of source participant.

participant.description: The participant to be added to the call.

RemoveParticipantRequest.description: The remove participant by identifier request.

identifier.description: The identifier of the participant to be removed from the call.

GetParticipantRequest.description: The get participant by identifier request.

PlayAudioToParticipantRequest.description: The request payload for playing audio to participant.

identifier.description: The identifier of the participant to play audio to.

audioFileUri.description:
The media resource uri of the play audio request. 
Currently only Wave file (.wav) format audio prompts are supported.
More specifically, the audio content in the wave file must be mono (single-channel),
16-bit samples with a 16,000 (16KHz) sampling rate.

loop.description: The flag indicating whether audio file needs to be played in loop or not.

operationContext.description: The value to identify context of the operation.

audioFileId.description: An id for the media in the AudioFileUri, using which we cache the media resource.

CancelParticipantMediaOperationRequest.description: The request payload for stopping a media operation for a participant.

mediaOperationId.description: The operationId of the media operation to cancel.

RecordingContentType.description: The content type of call recording.

RecordingChannelType.description: The channel type of call recording.

recordingStateCallbackUri.description: The uri to send notifications to.

recordingId.description: The recording id of the started recording

CallRecordingProperties.description: The response payload of get call recording properties operation.

JoinCallRequest.description: The request payload for join call.

requestedCallEvents.description: The requested call events to subscribe to.

JoinCallResult.description: The response payload of the join call operation.

PlayAudioWithCallLocatorRequest.description: The request payload for playing audio with call locator.

callbackUri.description: The callback Uri to receive PlayAudio status notifications.

audioFileUri.description:
The media resource uri of the play audio request. 
Currently only Wave file (.wav) format audio prompts are supported.
More specifically, the audio content in the wave file must be mono (single-channel),
16-bit samples with a 16,000 (16KHz) sampling rate.

loop.description: The flag indicating whether audio file needs to be played in loop or not.

operationContext.description: The value to identify context of the operation.

audioFileId.description: An id for the media in the AudioFileUri, using which we cache the media resource.

CancelMediaOperationWithCallLocatorReque.description: The request payload for stopping a media operation for a participant with call locator.

incomingCallContext.description: The context associated with the call.

incomingCallContext.description: The context associated with the call.

incomingCallContext.description: The context associated with the call.

target.description: The target identity to redirect the call to.

CallConnectionStateChangedEvent.description: The call connection state changed event.

CallRecordingStateChangeEvent.description: The call recording state change event.

startDateTime.description: The time of the recording started

sequenceId.description: The sequence id which can be used to determine if the same tone was played multiple times or if any tones were missed.
